--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hugar_twriker" <hugar_twriker@y...> wrote:
>    As Revealed in the last post the character's shuttle crashed 
> landed about 155 miles south of the maximal base.  The pieces from 
> the shuttle crash were scattered for hundreds of feet. Part of the 
> right wing was 318 feet from a piece of the nose.  There was a fire 
> from the engine to 200 feet behind the shuttle.  All the windows 
were 
> cracked and smoke raised from the main portion of the shuttle.  The 
> main portion of the shuttle was still somewhat intact.  It was 
> crushed yet still large enough to hold a bot.  The bots arm was 67 
> feet from the shuttle and the rest of the bot was nowhere to be 
found.
> 
>    All of a sudden from inside the main portion of the ship the was 
a 
> banging.  Tick Tick Tick.  The sound of a fist against metal.  
There 
> was screaming from inside the shuttle.
> 
>    "Slag!  Everytime I come to Earth there is bad things.  Like I 
> decided last time Earth will NOT be my grave.  The only problem is 
I 
> am STUCK!!!"  yelled the bot from within the wreck.  
> 
>    Slowly the bot got his remaining arm out of the ship through a 
> small hole.  He tried to squeeze out yet the hole was to small.  He 
> tried to hammer his arm at the hole to make it bigger.  He tried to 
> squeeze through the hole again this time he got his head through.  
> His face is silver with purple eyes and a purple forehead in the 
> middle.  He has a tanish skinlike object on the sides of his face.  
> This is face is reconized to be Cheetor's.  Cheetor then squeezed 
his 
> whole body through the hole.  After he squeezed his body through 
the 
> hole, he look around and saw his left arm lieing 67 feet away.  He 
> climbed out of the crater and slowly dragged himself away from the 
> ship and towards the arm as mechfluid dripped from his wounds.  
> Cheetor started to wonder how long it would be until someone would 
> find him.
> 
> OOC:  Yes it is the loveable cat bot Cheetor, but what is his 
purpose 
> to come back to Earth?  Do you care?
